MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 2.
As a result of my conversation and speculation with Leipzig, I understood that the ice wall we are suspended from is the mysterious giant creature that we are investigating.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Ticks, or mosquitoes...
With this body size difference, I really feel like I'm a bug.
Now I know how a tick feels, so I'll want to be nicer to them in the future.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, good joke. No mercy for vermin, Your Lordship.

This is so extreme that I'd lose my mind if I didn't joke about it... In any case, If you have a spare ice axe, please give it to me. It would be a shame to have you support me forever, and you'll reach your limit sooner or later―I want to pull my own weight.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
As much as we'd like to, most of my equipment, including my ice axes,
were lost when they fell when the giant creature rose.
That's troubling. Right now, Leipzig is supporting our full weight with one hand and preventing us from falling... She works out, but she's still young, so her strength is limited.

In fact, while she speaks matter-of-factly, perhaps to reassure me, she seems to be in a very tight spot and is sweating profusely. Even her thin arms are tense and twitching, as if they are about to be torn off.

She's going to collapse soon.
Before that happens, we need to make a last ditch effort to survive.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, sir. It may be difficult to do so in this position, but I ask you to inject as much iron as possible. After that, if you give me permission, I'd like to start taking action to get out of this situation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
To be honest, I've been waiting for you to wake up,
because I need your cooperation.

If that's the case, you should have said so sooner,
it wasn't the time to have a leisurely conversation and check the situation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, I'm sorry I'm not very good at making conversation, Your Lordship. Lately, I've been doing a lot of public appearances, and I feel I need to improve my communication skills.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you...I'm so clumsy.
That's one of the endearing things about you, Leipzig, and it's not a problem when you have a superior who talks endlessly even when try to leave her alone.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm happy if you describe it as adorable.
Leipzig's expression suddenly becomes tense. Apparently, the giant creature has just noticed the "ticks" that are attached to it and has started to shift.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Well, it looks like there's not a moment to lose.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'm about to perform an act that will be very hard on you.
But you must understand that this is all part of the plan to ensure our survival.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I ask you not to panic, not to make a fuss, not to resist, but to surrender to the current. I also ask that you immediately follow my instructions.

Understood. I don't know what you're planning to do.
but I'll always trust you, Leipzig.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thank you, sir.

As soon as she says that with a smile,
Leipzig puts all her strength into the hand that is grabbing mine.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Let's go, Your Lordship!
Don't complain to me later! Now! Hyaaah!!

With a battle cry, Leipzig throws my whole body right above her. With such precarious posture, how can she throw a large man with only her arm strength? I don't even know what's happening, and I'm thrown in the air, spinning and stunned.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now!
Leipzig shouts sharply and uses the momentum from throwing me to make a pendulum motion. Like a gymnast, she uses the ice axe as a base for a full turn before leaping straight up.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Your Lordship! Keep your eyes closed and don't move!

She pulls out the two pistols that are always hanging on her thighs and fires wildly. The bullets fire in different directions, gouging the skin of the giant ice wall creature and making it cave in. At the same time, the impact of the shots gives Leipzig's body propulsion.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haah!
In the middle of her leap, Leipzig hugs my flying body and secures me, while moving as if flying in the air like a bullet, using a number of sinkholes as footholds.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Secure!
We'll keep doing this over and over to get to the top of this wall!
Not that I'm complaining, but shouldn't you be aiming for the ground, not the top? If we descend close to the ground so that we don't die instantly if we fall...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No! The giant creature seems to be aware of our presence, so it will probably trample us down and wipe us out the moment we reach the ground!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So, we will continue to head to the top and get a complete picture of the enemy! I'll aim for the closest vital point and attack it, causing it to die or otherwise be silenced!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: At the very worst, I'll make it realize that we're not ticks, but dangerous, poisonous bees, and get rid of it! Is there a problem, Your Lordship?

No, it's a good call. There's no objection or counter-argument from me.
Do what you want.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Okay! Good!
While responding lightly, Leipzig fires her gun and flies in the air. Her actions are precise, lean, and dependable. I feel at ease and surrender myself to her.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Long live the SSS! Damn the foolish creatures who mistake our officers as mere helpless bait and arrogantly wait with their mouths open!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Execution of Justice...! We will slaughter you and will live on!
I'm sure you have some complaints, but I ask for your understanding!

Leipzig is dashing through the sky while calling out to even giant monsters in a ridiculously polite manner. I am intoxicated with a sense of happiness to witness the activities of such a hero of justice up closer than anyone else.
Okay, it's safe now. No matter what predicament we find ourselves in, our beloved hero will always be there to help us.
